prompt_text: When the Office WLED is turned on, save its current state. Then turn on all living room lights to 80%. After 10 minutes, restore the Office WLED to its saved state and turn off all living room lights
automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_boost_restore'
alias: Office WLED – Temporary Living Room Boost
description: "When Office WLED turns on, boost Living Room light for 10 minutes, then restore Office WLED and turn Living Room off"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_living_room_boost
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
  - delay: '00:10:00'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_living_room_boost
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, office, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
